nodes.text: In the Second Galactic Civil War around 40 ABY, Colonel Jacen Solo maintained a private task force that answered directly to him. This task force was part of the Galactic Alliance Guard of the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances. It is possible that this team dissolved after the death of Solo as the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Caedus in 41 ABY at Shedu Maad.
